# Changes in 2.12.3

- macOS builds are now signed and notarized, so they shouldn't cause any warning messages anymore
- Improve coat of arms renderer in a few places
- Readd wars and allies display for ck3 savegames
- Add russian translations (thanks to flashader)
- Improve error handling
- Update melter to HOI4 1.12
- Fix some display bugs for Victoria3 1.2
- Fix various other small bugs
